forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere breathes a cool embrace, marking a transition from a day that began with sunshine yet settled into the gentle caress of cloud cover. The forecast suggests a high of around 65 during the day, a modest warmth tempered by the sharp kiss of an invigorating southwest breeze carrying up to 22 mph gusts. Tonight, the sky will cloak itself in a mostly cloudy tapestry, the temperature drifting down to a soft 56, while the winds persist, a reminder of the city's characteristic charm.

While the drapes of fog may not fully enshroud the iconic skyline this evening, hints of a marine layer can still be felt as you stroll through the nearby streets. It's a splendid opportunity to embrace the subtle intrigue of the city without the disorienting blanket of fog often seen on summer evenings. Dressing in layers seems judicious; a light jacket will serve as a companion against the cooling night air, while a breathable outfit will keep you comfortable against the day’s residual warmth. With the evening inviting a leisurely exploration, consider a gentle walk along the waterfront, followed by a cozy seat at a local bistro, where the rich aromas of dinner waft through the air. The evening holds a promise of quiet reflection amid the lively pulse of the city that never stops captivating even in its more understated moments.
